Articles.Content:
> 
> I am sure that this has been brought, but the volume level - with the exception of lowering the engine volume. It there a way to get a balance? What I mean, is that when I have the engine volume at a level for say, 'mainsail', then it is hard to hear the 'poodle'
> Thanks and I am sorry of there was addressed already.

The phrase you are looking for is 'Volume Normalization', and I would like this as well. The rockets sound cool and all but I live in an apartment, I can't be blasting my neighbors with that level of noise.
What about adding SSTU stock support?

how do I increase the thickness and size of the flame trench plumes?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-29T04:53:18Z" title="10/29/2015 04:53  AM" data-short="8 yr">October 29, 2015</time> by lextacy**

> 
> Is support for near future spacecraft/propulsion planned?
> Also the Mammoth engine seems to have an odd plume, it gives off 4 very linear and long plumes with no smoke effects, also (i dont actually know) should the exhaust of this type of engine be blue?

I would really like to know this as well
SSTU support yet?

> 
> SSTU support yet?

How about more than 3 days for a mod that is not even finished? ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
are there configs for the novapunch engines?
great thxs

Hey can you make a realplume config for the USI Alcubierre drive and KPBS?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-03T15:36:19Z" title="11/03/2015 03:36  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 3, 2015</time> by AJTheMighty**

Cobalt is updating his engines tmrw.

- - - Updated - - -

PS: KPBS yes Alcubeirre what's the need?

The 2.5m USI alcubierre drive has two engines on either side of the ring; these engines could have beautiful blue-green plumes. That'd be cool ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

There could be only one plume for KPBS; the landing engine ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

EDIT: here's the link to the mod: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100798-1-0-4-Alcubierre-Warp-Drive-(Stand-alone)-v0-3-0-0-2015-10-16](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100798-1-0-4-Alcubierre-Warp-Drive-%28Stand-alone%29-v0-3-0-0-2015-10-16)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-06T05:00:14Z" title="11/06/2015 05:00  AM" data-short="8 yr">November 6, 2015</time> by AJTheMighty**
  
Link to mod
I'm still waiting for Stock SSTU. Can't you just take the plumes from RO and adopt them for stock?

> 
> I'm still waiting for Stock SSTU. Can't you just take the plumes from RO and adopt them for stock?

Make a pull request with the configs and I'm sure it will be merged. Otherwise quit nagging and be patient, you've made your request and are just pestering now.
How do I do that? On Github?
Hate to be the one who asks, but is the mod working in 1.0.5?

> 
> ;2290244']Hate to be the one who asks' date=' but is the mod working in 1.0.5?[/quote']
> Yep, it does. You'll have to make new configs for the fighter, mk0 and mk2 jets, aswell as the SSME. But since I'm a good guy imma just let you have mine. Enjoy.
> 
> [https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BweZJsIV3mtmYU9LaVN6ZDUzcms&usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BweZJsIV3mtmYU9LaVN6ZDUzcms&usp=sharing)
> 
> Just put them in ''...\GameData\RealPlume-Stock\Squad'' and you're good to go.

> 
> Yep, it does. You'll have to make new configs for the fighter, mk0 and mk2 jets, aswell as the SSME. But since I'm a good guy imma just let you have mine. Enjoy.
> [https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BweZJsIV3mtmYU9LaVN6ZDUzcms&usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BweZJsIV3mtmYU9LaVN6ZDUzcms&usp=sharing)
> 
> Just put them in ''...\GameData\RealPlume-Stock\Squad'' and you're good to go.

Not 100% working. For some reason it is causing the Whiplash to be rescaled.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/139135-Oversized-Whiplash](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/139135-Oversized-Whiplash)
I wrote a config for a mod (Bluedog Design Bureau) and I was looking to add it to your supported mods. How might I go about doing that?

That, and the after burner effects for some of the new engines don't work.   

Is anyone working on a 1.0.5 fix for this mod or know when it's going to get updated?
It works just fine on 1.0.5.

> 
> 
> 36 minutes ago, sashan said:
> 
> 
> On a side note, LH2 engines shouldn't have that long laminar flame in atmosphere - it should become turbulent and turn into smoke much, much earlier.
> 

Not really:

![677774main_jsc2011e067587-orig_full.jpg](http://www.nasa.gov/sites/default/files/thumbnails/image/677774main_jsc2011e067587-orig_full.jpg)

![delta4-heavy-launch4.jpg](http://i.space.com/images/i/000/018/899/i02/delta4-heavy-launch4.jpg)

I'm sure this is the wrong place to ask, but it might not be because it pertains to realplume. Now, I love it to death and cant play without it, but the one thing I wish it did was make the flame cone much smaller once you enter the vacuum of space, like in Scott Manley's videos on RSS. How do I get the effects to replicate his?

[Spaceships are serious business part 10](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JwkW8mLLhZQ&index=10&list=PLYu7z3I8tdEmUL3FrybnPybW5fHuOMB4S)
